divs: sighting detailsaround 8pm , friends on a smoke break from work noticed 3 objects high up in the sky. we got a video camera and have great footage of the them hoovering in formation for about 7mins. included in our footage are detailed video one of the objects a perfect ring shape slowly spinning, and the 2nd object ( a diamond shape) also spinning , but not moving forward. the objects made 2 formations a diagonal line shown in photo , and a 30 \ 60\ 90 degree triangle. they were video taped and seen with binoculars for 7mins until a passenger jet came into the area and then they vanished, if anyone out there will help us , we want our digital video tape to be analyzed ,
trends: There have been 45 other sightings in Long Beach
There were no other sightings in Long Beach on or around July 8th 2006
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: 3 ufos made 2 formation a diagonal line and a triangle, video taped them , looked like rings
